title: Writing HERstory: Tech pitchers make history at Longwood - VT hokiesports.com
content: Writing HERstory: Tech pitchers make history at Longwood  VT hokiesports.com
description: Emma Lemley and Ivy Rosenberry hurled their way into history Tuesday night, silencing Longwood in back-to-back no-hitters in a doubleheader in Farmville, Virginia. The No. 5 ranked Hokies triumphed over the Lancers 5-0 and 13-0 (five innings) in each of the pitchers' first collegiate no-hitters.
